posts.post_content:
Looking to acquire a 1910 COUPON of Chance (portrait).

Any condition is acceptable....graded or un-graded.

Thanks,

TED Z


P.S......No PM's

Email me at................

[url]tedzan11@comcast.net[/url]

Pretty sure you are aware....but here you go same place your Chase just came from...but here's one. :)

[url]http://www.legendaryauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?lotid=119395&searchby=1&searchvalue=t213&page=0&sortby=0&displayby=2&lotsperpage=25&category=1&seo=1910-T213-Coupon-Cigarettes-Type-1-PSA-Graded-Partial-Set-(41%2f68)-Including-Mathewson-and-Other-Hall[/url]
Ted - I think Johnny Wonka is angling for a finder's fee.  (Don't fall for it!) :rolleyes:

Nah I've been doing this since the 80's and I have always been fair and honest to deal with and have not had one deal gone bad. :rolleyes:

I don't need you to give me a finders fee, that would be so juvenile. :D

Cheers,

John
